## Exploratory Work

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# read in CSV of UK data
uk_carbon_data <- read_csv(here("data", "carbon_data_uk.csv"))
```

```{r}
# explore via visualization
ggplot(uk_carbon_data, aes(x = Year,
                           y = Total)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 2013,
             color = "red",
             linetype = "dashed") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "UK Carbon Emissions by Year")
```

```{r}
# filter to only data from 1850
uk_carbon_scope <- uk_carbon_data %>%
  filter(Year >= 1850)

ggplot(uk_carbon_scope, aes(x = Year,
                           y = Total)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 2013,
             color = "red",
             linetype = "dashed") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "UK Carbon Emissions by Year")
```
